title: Универ. 13 лет спустя
overview: Christina finally said goodbye to Anton, who is trying to live for his own pleasure and opens a pub. However, unexpectedly an adult daughter appears in his life, whom he did not know about before, which is why the lover of alcohol and parties will have to completely change his lifestyle.Meanwhile, Michael is desperately trying to win back Varya, who filed for divorce due to her husband's infidelity. And Masha carries two children alone while Valya disappears at work, waiting for a great scientific discovery. At this moment, her ex-boyfriend Kuzya unexpectedly appears in her life, who became a rich businessman and came to Moscow to expand his business. But the true goal of the "dumpling king" is to return Masha, whose feelings he retained after many years of separation.
